definition: Jinghua Yuan or Flowers in the Mirror, Qing novel of fantasy and erudition (early 19th century) by Li Ruzhen 李汝珍[Li3 Ru3 zhen1]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Jing hua yuan (Affinity Between Minor and Flower) is one of ancient novels with the most contents of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 《鏡花緣》是古代記載中醫藥內容最多的小說之一。

sentences.english: Abstract: [to] picked: "jinghuayuan" is one of the four great classics of ancient Chinese ghost story.
sentences.chinese: 《鏡花緣》是我國古代神怪小說四大名著之一。

definition: to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
hard to distinguish real from imitation
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
lit. not to know the true face of Lushan Mountain/fig. can't see the forest for the trees
pinyin: bu4 shi4 Lu2 shan1 zhen1 mian4 mu4

definition: lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
